mapper.insert: INSERT INTO permission_user(name, password, email, contact, department_code, enable) VALUES (#{name},#{password},#{email},#{contact}, (select code from basicinfo_department where name = #{department}), 1)
mapper.update: update permission_user pu inner join (select code,name from basicinfo_department)bd on bd.name = #{department} set pu.name = #{name}, pu.password = #{password}, pu.email = #{email}, pu.contact = #{contact}, pu.department_code = bd.code where pu.code = #{code}
mapper.select: select pu.code, pu.name, pu.password, pu.email, pu.contact, (select pr.name from permission_role pr where pr.code =pur.role_code) as roleName, bd.name as department from permission_user pu left join basicinfo_department bd on pu.department_code = bd.code left join permission_user_role pur on pu.code = pur.user_code
